verses.verse: Be ye <WG1096> therefore <WG3767> imitators <WG3402> of God <WG2316>, as <WG5613> beloved <WG27> children <WG5043>;

and <WG2532> walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> love <WG26>, even as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> loved <WG25> you <WG2248>, and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> himself <WG1438> up for <WG5228> us <WG2257>, an offering <WG4376> and <WG2532> a sacrifice <WG2378> to God <WG2316> for <WG1519> an odor <WG3744> of a sweet smell <WG3744>.

But <WG1161> fornication <WG4202>, and <WG2532> all <WG3956> uncleanness <WG167>, or <WG2228> covetousness <WG4124>, let it <WG3687> not even <WG3366> be named <WG3687> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, as <WG2531> becometh <WG4241> saints <WG40>;

nor <WG2532> filthiness <WG151>, nor <WG2532> foolish talking <WG3473>, or <WG2228> jesting <WG2160>, which <WG3588> are <WG433> not <WG3756> befitting <WG433>: but <WG235> rather <WG3123> giving of thanks <WG2169>.

For <WG1063> this <WG5124> ye know <WG1097> of a surety <WG2075>, that <WG3754> no <WG3956> fornicator <WG4205>, nor <WG2228> unclean person <WG169>, nor <WG2228> covetous man <WG4123>, who <WG3739> is <WG2076> an idolater <WG1496>, hath <WG2192> any <WG3756> inheritance <WG2817> in <WG1722> the kingdom <WG932> of Christ <WG5547> and <WG2532> God <WG2316>.

Let <WG538> no man <WG3367> deceive <WG538> you <WG5209> with <WG1223> empty <WG2756> words <WG3056>: for because of <WG1063> these things <WG5023> cometh <WG2064> the wrath <WG3709> of God <WG2316> upon <WG1909> the sons <WG5207> of disobedience <WG543>.
Be <WG1096> not <WG3361> ye <WG1096> therefore <WG3767> partakers <WG4830> with them <WG846>;

For <WG1063> ye were <WG2258> once <WG4218> darkness <WG4655>, but <WG1161> are now <WG3568> light <WG5457> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962>: walk <WG4043> as <WG5613> children <WG5043> of light <WG5457>
(for <WG1063> the fruit <WG2590> of the light <WG4151> is in <WG1722> all <WG3956> goodness <WG19> and <WG2532> righteousness <WG1343> and <WG2532> truth <WG225>),
proving <WG1381> what <WG5101> is <WG2076> well-pleasing <WG2101> unto the Lord <WG2962>;
and <WG2532> have <WG4790> no <WG3361> fellowship <WG4790> with the unfruitful <WG175> works <WG2041> of darkness <WG4655>, but <WG1161> rather <WG3123> even <WG2532> reprove them <WG1651>;
for <WG1063> the things which <WG3588> are done <WG1096> by them <WG846> in secret <WG2931> it is <WG2076> a shame <WG150> even <WG2532> to speak <WG3004> of <WG5259>.

But <WG1161> all things <WG3956> when <WG3588> they are reproved <WG1651> are made manifest <WG5319> by <WG5259> the light <WG5457>: for <WG1063> everything <WG3956> that is made manifest <WG5319> is <WG2076> light <WG5457>.

Wherefore <WG1352> he saith <WG3004>, Awake <WG1453>, thou that <WG3588> sleepest <WG2518>, and <WG2532> arise <WG450> from <WG1537> the dead <WG3498>, and <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> shall shine <WG2017> upon <WG2017> thee <WG4671>.
Look <WG991> therefore <WG3767> carefully <WG199> how <WG4459> ye walk <WG4043>, not <WG3361> as <WG5613> unwise <WG781>, but <WG235> as <WG5613> wise <WG4680>;
redeeming <WG1805> the time <WG2540>, because <WG3754> the days <WG2250> are <WG1526> evil <WG4190>.
Wherefore <WG5124> be ye <WG1096> not <WG3361> foolish <WG878>, but <WG235> understand <WG4920> what <WG5101> the will <WG2307> of the Lord is <WG2962>.
And <WG2532> be <WG3182> not <WG3361> drunken <WG3182> with <WG1722> wine <WG3631>, wherein <WG3739> is <WG2076> riot <WG810>, but <WG235> be filled <WG4137> with <WG1722> the Spirit <WG4151>;

speaking <WG2980> one to another <WG1438> in psalms <WG5568> and <WG2532> hymns <WG5215> and <WG2532> spiritual <WG4152> songs <WG5603>, singing <WG103> and <WG2532> making melody <WG5567> with <WG1722> your <WG5216> heart <WG2588> to the Lord <WG2962>;

giving thanks <WG2168> always <WG3842> for <WG5228> all things <WG3956> in <WG1722> the name <WG3686> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> to God <WG2316>, even <WG2532> the Father <WG3962>;
subjecting <WG5293> yourselves one to another <WG240> in <WG1722> the fear <WG5401> of Christ <WG2316>.
Wives <WG1135>, be in subjection unto <WG5293> your own <WG2398> husbands <WG435>, as <WG5613> unto the Lord <WG2962>.

For <WG3754> the husband <WG435> is <WG2076> the head <WG2776> of the wife <WG1135>, as <WG5613> Christ also <WG2532> is <WG5547> the head <WG2776> of the church <WG1577>, being <WG2532> himself <WG846> the <WG2076> saviour <WG4990> of the body <WG4983>.
But <WG235> as <WG5618> the church <WG1577> is subject to <WG5293> Christ <WG2532>, so <WG3779> let the wives <WG1135> also be to their <WG2398> husbands <WG435> in <WG1722> everything <WG3956>.

Husbands <WG435>, love <WG25> your <WG1438> wives <WG1135>, even as <WG2531> Christ <WG5547> also <WG2532> loved <WG25> the church <WG1577>, and <WG2532> gave <WG3860> himself <WG1438> up for <WG5228> it <WG846>;
that <WG2443> he <WG846> might sanctify <WG37> it <WG2511>, having cleansed it by the washing <WG3067> of water <WG5204> with <WG1722> the word <WG4487>,

that <WG2443> he might present <WG3936> the church <WG846> to himself <WG1438> a glorious <WG1741> church <WG1577>, not <WG3361> having <WG2192> spot <WG4696> or <WG2228> wrinkle <WG4512> or <WG2228> any <WG5100> such thing <WG5108>; but <WG235> that <WG2443> it should be <WG5600> holy <WG40> and <WG2532> without blemish <WG299>.

Even so <WG3779> ought <WG3784> husbands <WG435> also to love <WG25> their <WG1438> own wives <WG1135> as <WG5613> their own <WG1438> bodies <WG4983>. He that <WG3588> loveth <WG25> his <WG1438> own wife <WG1135> loveth <WG25> himself <WG1438>:

for <WG1063> no man <WG3762> ever <WG4218> hated <WG3404> his own <WG1438> flesh <WG4561>; but <WG235> nourisheth <WG1625> and <WG2532> cherisheth <WG2282> it <WG846>, even <WG2532> as <WG2531> Christ <WG2962> also the church <WG1577>;
because <WG3754> we are <WG2070> members <WG3196> of his <WG846> body <WG4983>.

For <WG473> this cause <WG5127> shall <WG2641> a man <WG444> leave <WG2641> his <WG846> father <WG3962> and <WG2532> mother <WG3384>, and <WG2532> shall cleave <WG4347> to <WG4314> his <WG846> wife <WG1135>; and <WG2532> the two <WG1417> shall <WG2071> become <WG1519> one <WG1520> flesh <WG4561>.
This <WG5124> mystery <WG3466> is <WG2076> great <WG3173>: but <WG1161> I <WG1473> speak <WG3004> in regard <WG1519> of Christ <WG5547> and <WG2532> of <WG1519> the church <WG1577>.

Nevertheless <WG4133> do25, 2596 ye also <WG2532> severally1538, 3779 love <WG25> each one <WG1520> his <WG1438> own wife <WG1135> even as <WG5613> himself <WG1438>; and <WG1161> let the wife <WG1135> see that <WG2443> she fear <WG5399> her husband <WG435>.
